Description: THIS GUITAR IS BLACK. PICKGUARD WHITE PERAL. THE COMP. PICS ARE NOT GOOD QUAILTY. SORRY. IT IS A GREAT LOOKING GUITAR. i had to take a seperat pic of the pickguard alone so you can see it without the ebay distortion in the SG pic,s. The pic,s are better on your phone. The SG is a reissue of a 60,s gibson SG. It is closest to a 1966 SG. Epiphone SG 400 2008 low action no buzzers fast thin neck great sound ROCKS!!!. THERE IS NO ISSUES WITH THIS SG. IT CAN DO ANY STYLE MUSIC YOU WANT NO PROBLEM. THE PUPS ARE ORIGINAL. I REMOVED THE COVER ON THE BRIDGE PICKUP TO GIVE MORE CLARITY ON HIGH GAIN. IT HAS A BIG SOUND AND IS THE WHEIGH OF A SIXTIES MELODY MAKER I GUESS 6 TO 7 LBS. PLEASE NOTE THE NEW GIBSON REISSUES ARE MUCH HEAVER THEN THE OLD MELODY MAKERS. THIS HAS THE SAME SOUND QUAILTY AS THE OLD GIBSONS. ENJOY THIS AX. I HAVE 3 MORE EPI,S THAT I AM KEEPING. THIS IS A GREAT GUITAR. ENJOY If you perfer the black pickguard i will change it to the original. I still have the original pickup cover just request it and i will include it with the guitar. thanx much. sorry about the bad pic,s. Thanx ebay for that.
Title: Epiphone SG 400 2008 Black WHITE PERAL P.G. fast neck  1966 reissue exc. guitar
